title: JavaScript Functions
description: Learn to create and call functions with parameters and return values.
constraints: Define a function with at least one parameter.
Return a value from the function.
Call the function and log the result.
starterCode:
// Define your function here

// Call your function and log the result
hints: Use function keyword to declare functions.
Parameters go inside parentheses: function myFunc(x, y).
Use return to send back a result.
